CustomField.formula: IF( AND( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MissedAppointment__c, FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_CaseManaged__c, FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MultipleAttemptedVisits__c ), "⚠️ Missed Appointment, Job flagged by operative, Multiple Attempted Visits", IF( AND( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_CaseManaged__c, FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MultipleAttemptedVisits__c ), "⚠️ Multiple Attempted Visits, Job flagged by operative", IF( AND( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MissedAppointment__c, FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_CaseManaged__c ),"⚠️ Missed Appointment, Job flagged by operative", IF( AND( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MissedAppointment__c, FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MultipleAttemptedVisits__c ),"⚠️ Missed Appointment, Multiple attempted visits", IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MissedAppointment__c, "⚠️ Missed Appointment", IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_CaseManaged__c, "⚠️ Job flagged by operative", IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_MultipleAttemptedVisits__c, "⚠️ Multiple Attempted Visits", "" ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Customer At Risk of Dissatisfaction
